interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BELLA MODA Sponges Blender Puff for Powder, Liquid and Cream Makeup 4PCS Purple Beauty Blending Sponge Foundations Powders Wet and Dry Used
Review Date: 2021/01/06
Store: BELLA MODA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BELLA MODA', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Material': 'Sponge', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '5.8 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '823544676230'}
Review Text: I used these a couple of different ways to take makeup off and put a moisturizer on my face, kinda soaked up into the sponge but if yeah it worked, and then just rinse out in warm soapy water. I also used it to blot polish on my nails, it gives it a cool effect. (didn't use the whole sponge) of course, came in a few different colors. Yeah I liked it enough to order again.
Review Title: many uses
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Beuaty Star 3PCS Poly Nail Gel Kit 30ml, Extension Gel Trial Kit Nail Enhancement Builder Gel Professional Nail Gel All-in One with with Base Top Coat
Beauty Star
{'Brand': 'Beauty Star', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '144.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 9.2 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
The product took a bit of extra time to finally get to me. In general, together is a good set.  A couple of things annoyed me. First, the nails - the poly forms, were fine but the case they're in not numbered and the nail themselves are numbered but so tiny it's very hard to make out. Also, the container be VERY careful it doesn't close well if dropped with the way their numbered it was hard to put them back in their home slots. The poly gel- very very tacky, I get it supposed to be but it made it a bit messy from the tube to the spatula, to the nail. The company did warm about the gel in the turn and working with it in cooler temperatures.  In the few kits I've received from the Vine program it was the only one with a tool/brush so yay!! overall a good product and kit to use.
good for beginners
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set 6 Colors Purple Blue Cat Eye Glitter Gel Polish 7.5 ml Soak Off UV LED Cure Home Salon Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '9.524 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches; 9.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890955'}
I used the darker cat's eye recently on a family member's hands, she loved it. A base, 2 thin coats, and a topcoat. UV light and was perfect. The bottles are small and come in 6 colors.  I think it would be good for the girl that has a kit already started or a shop. Great stocking stuffer. Oh, I didn't pick up on the "light" pine scent.  I'd order again.
beautiful colors

profile:
### Updated User Profile Summary

**Keywords:** Nail Enhancement, Gel Products, Makeup Tools, Beginner Friendly, Product Usability, Delivery Delays, Attention to Detail, Color Variety, Scent Sensitivity

**Preferences & Trends:**
- **Nail and Makeup Care Focus:** The user continues to demonstrate a keen interest in both gel-based nail enhancements and versatile makeup tools, reflecting a broader engagement with beauty products.
- **Beginner Orientation:** They maintain a preference for beginner-friendly options across categories, indicating a desire for ease of use in both nail care and makeup application.
- **Attention to Detail:** Previous concerns regarding packaging quality persist, with an emphasis on well-designed products that enhance usability and overall experience.
- **Delivery Experience:** The user values prompt and reliable delivery based on previous interactions, suggesting consistency in this expectation across all purchases.
- **Color Preferences:** Their recent interactions highlight an appreciation for a variety of colors, indicative of a playful approach to both nail styles and makeup application.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** As previously noted, the user remains conscious of product fragrances, preferring non-overpowering scents in both nail and makeup products.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Despite a few minor usability issues with products, the user maintains a positive outlook, valuing functionality and aesthetic appeal in their beauty routine.

This profile illustrates a user who is engaged in the beauty community, seeking enjoyable, reliable, and aesthetically pleasing products that enhance their DIY nail and makeup experiences.
